channel.title: Stuck in the '80s
channel.description: Your weekly '80s fix. Ah, the memories.
channel.copyright: St. Petersburg Times and tbt* Tampa Bay Times
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stuck in the '80s
channel.itunes:summary: Stuck in the '80s explores that MTV-generation nostalgia that still stirs up emotion no matter what the age. Whether it's '80s movies, pop culture, music or old-school memories, this engaging podcast will help you reminisce and chuckle about a defining era of history.
channel.itunes:author: tampabay.com

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 1 (7.22.05)
item.description: In the first Stuck in the '80s episode, our hosts Gina and Steve discuss the glory days of high school, and the movie that defined and disrupted a generation, The Breakfast Club. Get in the know with movie trivia and interesting facts you definitely have forgotten.
item.itunes:subtitle: Stuck in the '80s Episode 1 (7.22.05)
item.itunes:summary: In the first Stuck in the '80s episode, our hosts Gina and Steve discuss the glory days of high school, and the movie that defined and disrupted a generation, The Breakfast Club. Get in the know with movie trivia and interesting facts you definitely have forgotten.
item.itunes:keywords: John Hughes, Breakfast Club, '80s movies
item.itunes:author: tampabay.com

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 2 (7.28.05)
item.description: Hosts Gina and Steve love tunes from the '80s, but they can't agree what to make of Paul Anka's new tribute album to the songs of their youth. Hear their arguments, listen to some song samples and decide for yourself: Paul Anka ... cool or bogus?
item.itunes:subtitle: Hosts Gina and Steve love tunes from the '80s, but they can't agree what to make of Paul Anka's new tribute album to the songs of their youth.
item.itunes:summary: Hosts Gina and Steve love tunes from the '80s, but they can't agree what to make of Paul Anka's new tribute album to the songs of their youth. Hear their arguments, listen to some song samples and decide for yourself: Paul Anka ... cool or bogus?
item.itunes:keywords: Paul Anka, cover songs
item.itunes:author: tampabay.com

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 3 (8.04.05)
item.description: The hosts chat about their love affair with Footloose, Kevin Bacon and Kenny Loggins' hit 1984 song. However, guest Steve Persall, the Times movie critic, sets them straight on how bad the movie is. The '80s songs are reason enough to tune into this podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: The hosts chat about their love affair with Footloose, Kevin Bacon and Kenny Loggins' hit 1984 song.
item.itunes:summary: The hosts chat about their love affair with Footloose, Kevin Bacon and Kenny Loggins' hit 1984 song. However, guest Steve Persall, the Times movie critic, sets them straight on how bad the movie is. The '80s songs are reason enough to tune into this podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: Footloose, Kevin Bacon, Kenny Loggins
item.itunes:author: tampabay.com

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 4 (8.10.05)
item.description: Happy anniversary, Sean Penn and Madonna! Almost. The movie and music icons of the '80s married 20 years ago this week. Hosts Gina and Steve, along with Times pop music critic Sean Daly, wonder how two stars with completely different personas hooked up in the first place and discuss how their careers changed after the divorce.
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy anniversary, Sean Penn and Madonna!
item.itunes:summary: Happy anniversary, Sean Penn and Madonna! Almost. The movie and music icons of the '80s married 20 years ago this week. Hosts Gina and Steve, along with Times pop music critic Sean Daly, wonder how two stars with completely different personas hooked up in the first place and discuss how their careers changed after the divorce.
item.itunes:keywords: Madonna, Sean Penn
item.itunes:author: tampabay.com

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 5 (8.19.05)
item.description: Gabba gabba hey! Any Blitzkrieg Boppers out there? This is your week. Hosts Gina and Steve take on the Ramones, the pioneering band that helped create the American punk rock movement. A special guest shares his own Ramones tribute song.
item.itunes:subtitle: Gabba gabba hey! Any Blitzkrieg Boppers out there?

item.title: Stuck in the '80s Episode 6 (8.25.05)
item.description: Remember the movie Say Anything? John Cusack plays a character by which every girl would measure their boyfriends against. It's the first movie directed by genius film god Cameron Crowe, and it's -- dare we say -- a classic '80s flick. Also, a major Cusack fan stops by the studio to share her unwavering love for the heartthrob.
item.itunes:subtitle: Remember the movie Say Anything?
